name: New Beginnings (The Wrong John)
description:
Pixel art driving obstacle course with increasing speed. 

All art, music, and game stuff by The Wrong John. Background music from  Earache Album, soundFX from The Wrong Samples sample pack. 

In development one sound wouldn't play on WebGL build.

This is the sound. you can just imagine it in there when you get points...

Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023. 

Ongoing development blog here

https://redninja83882493.wordpress.com
